title: Account is being processed... Please wait... is happening with version 128.3.0esr (32 bit) is there a fix?

creator: dick.sudbury

title: No message found
content:
When the Inbox is displayed and I delete one message, suddenly all the messages disappear. In their place is "No message found" even though the upper left of the screen shows that there are messages in the Inbox. All other folders also appear to have no messages.

The fix is to close and restart Thunderbird, and all messages re-appear. This happens at least once a day.

The program is running on Xubuntu 24.04.1. There are many message filters and the profile is around 7 GB.

Thanks in advance for any suggestion on how to fix. A screenshot is attached.
creator: c.rathbone

title: le bozze vengono salvate omettendo il contenuto
content: A distanza di parecchio tempo dall'ultima volta che ho salvato una bozza (senza problemi) oggi ho provato a salvare un messaggio come bozza, per completarlo in seguito; riaprendo la bozza, però, il messaggio non contiene il testo, ma solo il destinatario e l'oggetto. Come posso risolvere il problema ? Grazie a chi vorrà aiutarmi. Francesco
creator: posta29

title: After October 10 update, Thunderbird does not retrieve / download mail on one account
content:
I have the same issue and behavior reported in question 1468895 following update 128.3.1esr.

When I "get new mail," another account processes and my main one does nothing with no status message display. It used to be that when "nothing" happened, I would try again and be asked to confirm a security exception and then it worked again.

A tablet pc I use for travel with the same update continues to download mail for this account, though more hesitatingly than it did.

The error console shows: NotFoundError: No such JSProcessActor 'BrowserToolboxDevToolsProcess' pop3.server1.4: SecurityError: a SecurityCertificate error occurred Pop3Client.sys.mjs:380:18 pop3.server1.4: SecurityError info: SSL_ERROR_BAD_CERT_DOMAIN Pop3Client.sys.mjs:422:20 pop3.server1.4: SecurityError cert chain: securepop.siteprotect.com; serial# 20:C8:AF:E0:B1:95:42:48:9C:C8:21:21:4A:87:89:B8 <- Avast Web/Mail Shield Root; serial# 4D:D7:A4:81:AF:9D:DF:4D:8F:45:D8:21:07:23:2D:0A Pop3Client.sys.mjs:427:22 tb.account.size_on_disk - Truncating float/double number. 2

I turned off the antivirus email feature and then it read: NotFoundError: No such JSProcessActor 'BrowserToolboxDevToolsProcess' pop3.server1.4: SecurityError: a SecurityCertificate error occurred Pop3Client.sys.mjs:380:18 pop3.server1.4: SecurityError info: SSL_ERROR_BAD_CERT_DOMAIN Pop3Client.sys.mjs:422:20 pop3.server1.4: SecurityError cert chain: securepop.siteprotect.com; serial# 0F:F0:5D:99:50:38:74:73:10:57:9F:F7:75:85:06:4A <- GeoTrust TLS RSA CA G1; serial# 0D:07:78:2A:13:3F:C6:F9:A5:72:96:E1:31:FF:D1:79 Pop3Client.sys.mjs:427:22
creator: ljones1

title: Hotmail
content:
Thunderbird ei hyväksy hotmailin salasanaa, vaikka netin kautta pääsen lukemaan viestit ja myös lähettämään niitä. Pari viikkoa sitten se vielä toimi

Thunderbird does not accept Hotmail's password, even though I can read messages and also send them via the Internet. A couple of weeks ago it was still working
creator: martti.kivinen

title: Kan geen submappen meer aanmaken
content: Sinds een recente update, van Thunderbird is het niet meer mogelijk submappen aan te maken, in geen enkel account en ook niet in lokale mappen. Als ik submap aanmaken aanklik gebeurt er vervolgens niets. Ik maak vaak en veel submappen, dus ik heb het hard nodig. Verder heb ik in probleem oplossing mode "Werkbalken en bedieningselementen herinitialiseren" aangezet en nu kan ik de kolommen niet meer instellen. Ik gebruik TB al jaren en had graag mijn oude instellingen weer terug. Is daar een automatische backup van.
creator: beuzendrenth

title: HOW TO REMOVE MY OWN UNWANTED, UNUSED EMAIL ADDRESSES?
content: When I set up my Thunderbird Mail I had intended it to serve 6 email addresses. I then scrapped my intentions to use three of those, and they no longer show up in my available emails. However, the program keeps asking for the access passwords for all three and it's a continual nuisance being interrupted all day long - BUT I can't find ay trace of them in Thunderbird to be able to block them. I use the other 3 on a frequent basis but they are the only email addresses i can now see in my account. How can I find access to the other 3 to delete all trace of them?? Yours hopefully John Reed
creator: jreed198

title: Non riesco a leggere le email antecedenti alla data 18/08/2024
content: Salve, è da un po' di tempo che mi si è presentato questo problema. Uso Thunderbird per lavoro e proprio per questo ho la necessità di accedere alle email vecchie, per verificare e controllare alcune cose. Mi sono resa conto che Thunderbird non mi permette di visualizzare alcuna email che sia antecedente al 18/08/2024. La visualizzazione del messaggio è inesistente, riesco a vedere l'oggetto, unica cosa che riesco a visualizzare nella schermata iniziale insieme a tutti gli altri, ma quando poi ci clicco per aprire effettivamente la mail mi viene una schermata bianca. Non riesco nemmeno a vedere se ci sono allegati o meno. Questo è un problema per me molto grande e non riesco a risolverlo, ho provato in tutti i modi. Vorrei anche chiedere se esiste un numero di assistenza telefonica per parlare con un operatore, se in futuro dovessi avere ulteriori problemi. Grazie mille per la vostra attenzione, spero che possiate aiutarmi.
creator: raffaelaragucci64

title: Attachments are the same picture
content:
This is a weird one. With my sbcglobal.com email account, attachments are the same image file DSCN3043.JPG. When this happens, regardless of the email message, the attachment is the same image file. I have no idea where it comes from or who originated it. (Checked Google and there are lots of files with that name, but not the image I see.) I can go to the underlying Yahoo web site email and view the correct message.

I've tried to reproduce it by sending my own image file (embedded or attached) from my gmail account, but it works as it should.

Any clues?

Thanks, Paul
creator: paulnit82

title: Thunderbird shows "No Message Found" .
content: Initially Thunderbird works normally, but then, after a while (sometimes a few minutes, sometimes longer) "No Message Found" appears if I try to look in any folder. The only way out of this is to close and restart Thunderbird. Running v.128.3.1esr (64 bit). Also, minor issue, this version is slower to start. Previous versions of Thunderbird worked flawlessly. System: Intel i7-600 @ 3.4GHz, 32Gb RAM, 64 bit, Win10 Pro, Build 19045.5011. Thank you.
creator: njziggy

title: Fetch messages...
content: Is it possible to make Thunderbird (128.3.1esr) fetch the messages itself when you open the program, without pressing the "Fetch messages" button? /hans peter

title: multi account download
content: before tb 128.3.1esr, tb would download from more then one e-mail account at time. now it downloads one account at a time, why??

title: how to enable calendar?
content: Error message: Calendars currently disabled., Enable Calendar. Not intuitive or user friendly. How to enable calendar? Search help, support, no information? Would expect to find in settings, or tools, but not there. Where is the secret hidden?
creator: dinet_field70

title: "Unified Folders" view, "Inbox" not just showing Inboxes, but also showing every eMail in every directory and subdirectory of every account
content:
In my "Unified Folders" view, selecting "Inbox" in the navigation tree is not just showing Inboxes, but also showing every eMail in every directory and subdirectory of every account, which defeats the purpose of organizing eMails into a directory structure. I'm coming from Outlook, which doesn't do this. I'm used to being able to keep my Inbox clean by moving eMails to various directories so that I can save them, yet have them out of the way, and keep a clean Inbox screen.

Is there any way to tell Thunderbird to show my only those eMails that are in the "Inbox" folder in each of the Unified accounts, rather than showing me every eMail at every depth in the directory tree for all accounts?

Thanks for any help with this!
creator: bill355

title: Says I need permission to download Thunderbird
content: I get a message that says I need permission to download Thunderbird. I am running Windows 10. Why am I getting this message and, how do I get permission?
creator: rblument
